formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SpeechUnloadGrammar' =-
[Synopsis] Unload a Grammar
[Description] SpeechUnloadGrammar(Grammar Name) Unload a grammar. It takes the grammar name as the only argument.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,5 +4,5 @@ Unload a Grammar
[Description] - SpeechUnloadGrammar(Grammar Name) + SpeechUnloadGrammar(Grammar Name): Unload a grammar. It takes the grammar name as the only argument.
